item.title: Coding help and advise
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

We dont bumb our thread
William this is official the last warning that i give you …

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:1, topic:223”]Here are the rules and guidelines for both Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org.

1. We are not anti-leech. If you respect our community and our ideas, feel free to ask questions and they will be kindly answered if you follow other rules. Answer to questions that others ask if you know the answer or remain silent!
2. We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is an informative, not a misinformative community.
3. We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc.
4. We don’t make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
5. We don’t “bump” or double post.
6. We respect each other and other communities. We don’t flame each other or other communities. We don’t fight on the forums.
7. We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from Moparisthebest. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on Moparisthebest.com main page.
8. We don’t care about post count alone. If someone has high post count and most of it is spam, we hate him. If someone has high post count with informative posts, we love him. The higher count, the more we hate/love him.
9. We don’t talk about “rep” ever, whether you are asking for it or saying that you have given it.
10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right? )
11. We don’t sell anything on these forums with the exception of SCAR scripts.
12. We never have misleading links in our signatures or posts. If your signature or posts says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.
13. Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com for these things.
14. We only have 1 Forum account for Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org. If you get banned or have trouble logging in, email an admin, or get a friend to contact an admin. Multiple accounts will result in Bans.

If any of these rules have been broken, then you will be punished. So please, just follow our rules.

We’re not asking much. Thank you.[/quote]

Read full topic
